message.body: Can i meet you tomorrow?? Do you have time to meet?
Sorry, I won't be free tomorrow. I'm free on Friday, but you're busy then, right?
Yes~:( okay, thanks! see you later~
Sorry! If there's something specific you want to ask about, you can email or text me, but we probably won't meet again in person until next week.
I misunderstood!! Can i meet you on Thursday morning?

I won't be free for the rest of this week except on Friday. Sorry if I wasn't clear. What I meant is that, if you have a specific question about something, you can email or text me it. You're not asking about next Thursday, right?
I mean, do you have time to meet on this Thursday?
No, I'm only free Friday. Sorry for the confusion!
